DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this clinical study is to verify the long term effectiveness and safety of a bilateral deep brain stimulation (DBS) produced by Beijing PINS Medical Co., Ltd. as a treatment option for patients with cognitive, behavioral, and functional disability of Tourette Syndrome.
DOC.brief_title: The Safety and Efficacy of Long-term Treatment of PINS Stimulator System for Tourette Syndrome
DOC.criteria: 1. Subject is aged 18 or older 2. Patient Group with Tourette's syndrome, Diagnosis of Tourette Syndrome by DSMIV 1. Major Depressive Episode within the previous 6 months 2. Schizophrenia or other psychotic disorder.Participate in other clinical trial; 3. Has a life expectancy of < 1 year. 4. The investigator and/or enrollment review committee, would preclude participation in the study.
